alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 3:44PM MST until March 05 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with up to 8 inches on the benches and for higher elevation valleys. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Fort Hall, Malta, Sweetzer Summit, Rockland, Inkom, McCammon, Lava Hot Springs, Malad, Malad Summit, Preston, Montpelier, Georgetown, Georgetown Summit, Geneva Summit, Border Summit, Soda Springs, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Dubois, Spencer, Monida Pass, and Small. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to pockets of blowing and drifting snow, as well as low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
